attributes.additional_details:
For too long have people died without reason in the land of Palestine under the Israeli war machine. Britain is just as guilty by not doing enough to stop this human suffering.

Britain can lead the way by enforcing a boycott of any Israeli made produce or goods, expelling the Israeli ambassador, demand the return to the 1967 borders and to cut all diplomatic ties.

Until this happens Britain should not have any Israeli Diplomatic ties.
